markdownRemark.html:
About life.

First of all sorry for the long pause in blogging.😢
I have not done many worth things lately and being slacking off.
But today something hit me, an App called the life clock 🌱, It made me realize that I have only 18255 or more days (If nothing happens 😉) to live. which means I only have 54765 meals, 49 long vacations, and 2607 weekends.⏰
So from now on, I made a pledge to live my life to the fullest and make most out of my time to make a difference in this world.
Starting with:

  1. Strict Timetable ⏲
  2. Blogging only on weekends with enough content and long post 📯
  3. I am still thinking of it 🤔

From now on Turbo mode ✨

frontmatter.title: About life.
frontmatter.description: I am starting to realize scary stuff about my life.
